translations: 木乃伊（mummy 的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: Although several ancient cultures practiced mummification, mummies from ancient Egypt are generally more well-preserved than mummies of similar antiquity from other cultures.
sentences.translation: 尽管有几个古代文化有木乃伊化的习俗，但古埃及的木乃伊通常比其他文化中类似古代的木乃伊保存得更好。

sentences.sentence: "I try to treat mummies like patients," he says.
sentences.translation: “我试着将木乃伊看作病人，”他说。

sentences.sentence: Of the 19 mummies examined, only three are Mongolian.
sentences.translation: 检验的19个干尸中，只有三个是蒙古人。
